description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Philip Muwanga proudly presents: “Funky Balls”. Blast off to space with your avatar and tackle 25 fiendishly difficult levels of platforming action, designed put your skills to the test. Race against the clock to collect gems and monkeys. Unlock new balls to roll, jump slide and grapple your way to goal!
